function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Smart technologies used for top-down pandemic containment","Impact":"Loss of privacy and freedom of movement, potential for misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Transparent data usage policies, strict privacy regulations, public awareness and education","Technologies":"Facial recognition, geolocation tracking, color-coded ranking programs","People":"Citizens, residents","Owner":"Government, policy makers"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency and ethical use of smart technologies","Impact":"Potential for discrimination and bias in technology usage, violation of human rights","Mitigation":"Ethical guidelines, independent oversight, accountability and transparency in technology usage","Technologies":"Facial recognition, geo-tagging, data analytics","People":"Citizens, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, technology developers"},{"Description":"Limited access and usage of smart technologies in different social and political contexts","Impact":"Inequality in access to pandemic tracking tools, disparity in containment measures","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of technological resources, tailored solutions for different communities, public-private partnerships","Technologies":"Smart phone applications, digital tracking tools","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income individuals","Owner":"Government, private sector"}]}
